caption: I entered this place on Friday looking to stay at the counter, the mananger said that only with reservation and so far ok, but he did not give me the option of waiting for a place, I felt badly treated, that is, I will never enter this place again.

What we thought was going to be a classic Spanish tapas experience turned into gastronomical creations. Great ideas - most tasted good, a few were too rich or one note for me (MAD tomato). Prices were in line with the location. Would come back to find more things I like and try more of the cocktail menu.

Most of the tapas we ordered were tasty. Octopus was cooked perfectly - buttery texture with crispy edges, and flavorful. Mussels were also good. Our waiter Juan was friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive. We loved his food and drink recommendations! All other staff who approached our table were great too.

Everything was amazing from the customer service to the ambiance! The food was really good and reasonably priced. The drinks were impeccable and strong as well! Thank you Patty and Henry for making my first dining experience at MAD unforgettable! I love MAD and can’t wait to return!

Excellent attention, service, and all dishes were great, except one, which the server removed from the bill when she inquired how it was (noticing we did not eat much of it. ). 2nd visit but not the last.

Went for brunch and it was amazing. Great service from David who took care of us. Food was delicious and the cheese cake for dessert topped it off. Decor is unlike any other restaurant in town and the whole experience was exactly what we expected based off of our friends’ comments. Thanks MAD staff!

My review is only one star because the restaurant had a great vibe and music. Everything else was TRULY not worth the 4 week wait. The drinks were good but extremely overpriced. The food was honestly nothing special. The flavors were bland …

Absolutely nice and fun place to go on the weekend, but the price aren't cheap... Make sure you know that
Excellent Food, Excellent Service

Love this new restaurant, MAD! Short for Madrid, this refined and creative tapas concept of Spanish flavors and night life is brought to you by BCN. The drinks & bites are unique and delicious! The Mad tomato is a must!  Pictured drink & bites are: Sandia Mad tomato Steak tartar Pac mad de calamar Mixto de sobrasada y queso Cigala
Great atmosphere! Drinks had a terrible taste and they were weak... food was decent nothing extraordinary

Tapas and rices.  New spanish restaurant in houston... amazing and trendy I just came back from Spain and I can tell you that we have the same quality and taste here in town!!
Don't waste your time or money

Fantastic food and service! The restaurant design is top notch as well. Just make sure to plan ahead when coming here. I had to make a reservation 3 weeks in advance, and the only time I could book was 5:45pm. I'm not complaining, just …
Hip Trendy Place with great food
This place is such a fun experience. Went here wit my fiancee and he really loved it.

I can’t wait to come back here. Photos don’t do this place justice. The service is amazing as is the food. I love the ambiance. I would highly recommend the olive tapas dish as well as all the deserts. You literally can’t go wrong.

Like the atmosphere food is good but seriously ridiculous on reservation availability.
The best gin selection I have ever seen. The paella is amazing, and pretty much everything is just fantastic.
Amazing cocktails and the dessert was art.
Fun experience and I think everyone should go once! But, the food wasn’t amazing. I would only go back for drinks.

This is definitely a magical restaurant. The decor is so creative. I felt like I was in a different world. You must check out the bathroom. I will say no more as I love surprises myself. So, the food... I can honestly say that I enjoyed …
Amazing ambiance and great value for delicious food!
Food is delicious, something for everyone's palate.  The wait staff is friendly and prompt.  I will be back again soon.
MAD about you...been to Madrid, Spain several times...my husband and I had a blast at MAD!!! The food/drinks was delish and the service was impressive. 💃See u again soon.  Monalisa😊 & Honey
Beautiful restaurant.  Delicious meal.  Great experience.
World class restaurant in Houston. Creative and traditional Spanish food...MAD = Madrid
Good decor, good vibe and great service. Food was ok! I did not enjoy all the dishes

The ambiance is breathtaking here.  You feel like you are in a vegas restaurant!  Love the food! a item that is a must try is their potatoes! you wont regret having this carb:)  This restaurant is a must try!!
Amazing experience!

Awesome atmosphere!! Live DJ, very attentive staff! For a new experience in dining if you have never been outside the box, this is the place! A little hard to find but worth the effort. No pictures because of the atmosphere I didn't want to infringe on anyone's privacy. Oh and AWESOME alcoholic beverages.
Great place to go!

Fantastic restaurant!! I am from Spain i think this is real good spanish food. Tapas are creative and rice is awesome, totally authentic. Also some impressive surprises on desserts such as the manchego cheese coulant...  The decoration and atmosphere are amazing too!! Definitively new top restaurant in the city!

Drinks were great and the buildout of the space is really cool. Food was not very good, especially at the price point. I would give this place another shot.

This was definitely a great experience! Service is admirable, quality and taste of the food outstanding, it is an experience you will not easily get elsewhere. Fully recommend it. You must try the “Pulpo” Enjoy!

I have heard great things about this restaurant which means a lot to me because I was raised in Madrid. The problem is there is no way to find the prices and if it is a fixed menu or if the brunch is a real brunch.
Went for a few drinks after a concert around midnight and the place was packed. Can't wait to try the food in a few weeks.

Recently visited MAD for the first time with friends and had an incredible experience!  Their cocktails are delicious and the tapas-style dishes were mouth-watering. If you love octopus, this dish is a must-have. I would also highly …
Love it !!!

"I went for my girlfriends birthday and could have not have had a better experience. The service was great and fast, the food was very similar to the one I have had in Spain, and the ambiance made it all a perfect dinner."
Fantastic restaurant!  Food is excellent.  Superior service.  Beautiful ambiance.  Nacho Torras is a genius!

Been twice. Impressed with the level of customer service from the wait staff, hostesses and the management. Friendly,  accommodating and management checked on us after our meal to make sure we were pleased. Paella and steak tartare were …

This place is super instagram friendly. The interior design is phenomenal and the service is great too.... but the food is bland and the portions are small. Me and my husbands meal was over 100 dollars (not including tip) and we were still hungry...
The food is very flavorful ! Bartenders are great. Worth the reservation
Chris was the best bartender, and he picked everything we ate.. We will be book soon

Recently opened, tough to get a table. The vibe is that of New York and the menu is of a gastronomic experience of Spain with small plates meant to be shared. They have a wonderful selection of gin cocktails during the meal. They also had a wonderful selection of sweet wines post meal. Definitely an interesting wine list.
Nahhhhh! I will skip this place the next time. Trying to do Fusion Spanish cuisine with no flavor. Slow and inattentive servers, rude greeting and cocky managers.
I've been to many restaurants around the world.  This place is great.  The food is perfectly executed.  And the staff is very focused and professional.

While more than 50% of the tables and bar in the restaurant is empty, you can’t say its reservations only, also don’t forget its restaurant and bar not a nightclub. Trying to make something exclusive this way  just won’t work in Houston, it’s not London.

As a longtime fan of BCN, I was expecting great food and service. MAD definitely did not disappoint. This is a unique dining experience that's needed in Houston. Thanks for delivering. Well worth the wait!
It’s just so delicious.
Wonderful experience

We were looking forward to this place however we were not impressed by few things. Place is beautiful though however dishes are very tiny since they are tapas style. Drinks were very well presented. AC was not good and since it is Summer in Texas I understand.

Great food, Great Service. Will go again!
Such a great place to have dinner! The staff was excellent all night! I highly recommend this place!
Best restaurant in Houston! I loved every aspect of it. Definitely recommend and will be back soon.
Horrible customer service. Food is over priced and bland. Not worth the hype.

Terrible experience!!! To beginning with, the door guys were very disrespectful, the manager didn’t even apologize for what happened, and the food was not good. I will never go back.

Amazing food and ambience! Great place for drinks and tapas, a new must visit when in Houston.

Great food and ambiance!
